overview: Log on and 'Work It Up' as six horny techies labor over computers all day only breaking to labor over each other's hot bodies, cocks and asses. These aren't you average everyday computer nerds. They're some of the hottest coders you'll ever witness, and the action may cause a meltdown in your motherboard. In Falcon's latest feature directed by Tony Dimarco, these co-workers overflow with testosterone and pent up sexual frustration that naturally leads to hardcore fucking at the office.
title: Work It Up
